comments.body:
I think using `test_dev` was an accident; we can probably remove this import.

```suggestion
```

comments.body:
Perhaps explicit imports here?

```suggestion
import com.digitalasset.ledger.test_stable.Test.{Dummy, TextContainer}
```

(I highly suggest double-checking that this makes sense and will compile before committing it.)
